dct_title_s: Energy map of Mexico / produced by the Petroleum Economist Ltd., London, a division of Euromoney Global Ltd., in association with Fermaca ; designed by K. Fuller and P. Bush ; satellite derived imagery courtesy of CGG NPA Satellite Mapping.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown shading. Depth shown by shading. Shows crude oil fields, structures and pipelines (existing, under construction, and planned), gas fields, processing plants, and pipelines (existing, under construction, and planned), and electricity transmission lines and power stations. Satellite derived imagery courtesy of CGG NPA Satellite mapping. "Published May 2015". Tables and graphs: Mexico - consumption by fuel type 2013 -- Oil and gas reserves and production statistics 2013 -- Mexico - liquefied natural gas (LNG) projects -- Renewable energy - capacity.
